summary: This is an email chain from July 12, 2019, discussing a scheduling conflict for a detention hearing related to Jeffrey Epstein. The participants, including U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman, are coordinating to reschedule the hearing from Monday to Wednesday at 10:00 a.m.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.context: Participant in an email chain about rescheduling a detention hearing for Jeffrey Epstein; his office is involved in the scheduling.

events.title: Originally Scheduled Epstein Detention Hearing
events.description: A detention hearing for Jeffrey Epstein was originally scheduled for Monday at 10 a.m.

events.title: Rescheduled Epstein Detention Hearing
events.description: The detention hearing for Jeffrey Epstein was rescheduled to Wednesday at 10:00 a.m. due to a conflict.

keyFacts: The email chain is dated July 12, 2019, shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest.
A detention hearing for Epstein was initially set for Monday, July 15, 2019, at 10 a.m.
The hearing was rescheduled to Wednesday, July 17, 2019, at 10:00 a.m. due to a scheduling conflict.
U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman is directly involved in the scheduling communication.
The correspondence indicates active case management by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) regarding Epstein's detention.
